   Description  
________________
_______________________________________________________________
The film centers on a wounded Gulf war veteran who returns to 
his native Vermont suffering from bouts of amnesia. He is 
hitching and gets picked up by a stranger, things go pear 
shaped when a cop pulls them over and is murdered by the 
stranger. The vet. is wrongly accused of killing the cop 
and lands up in an asylum. A quack doctor prescribes a course 
of experimental therapy, restraining him in a heavy duty 
straight jacket-like device, and locks him away in a body 
drawer of the basement morgue. During course of his treatment 
he gets flashbacks and visions of his future , where he can 
foresee he is to die in four days time. The catch is he 
doesn't know how. Thus commences the classic race against time
